INNOVATEC (**In**vestigación en I**n**geniería **O**perativa, **V**ideojuegos y **A**plicaciones **Tec**nológicas - Research in Operational Engineering, Video Games, and Technological Applications) is a new research group that combines: - Software Engineering, Computer Graphics, Video Games, and Educational Technologies - Qualitative, Operational, and Metaheuristic Research

© 2024 INNOVATEC Research Group.
Site based on the Allan Lab open source template.

We are part of the ETSISI at the Technical University of Madrid (UPM).

Contact: gi.innovatec@upm.es
Campus Sur (Vallecas)
